trans:
Street
House number
Block
Staircase
Floor Door
Postcode City
Company contact
Phone number (reachable during the day)
E-mail address
Phone number for existing A1 Contract. If you do not have an A1 Contract: Your personal customer password, which you can use to change your A1 Contract (tariff, address, etc.), accept offers or obtain information:
Only a 4-digit number, except for 1234 and four identical digits. Example: 8888
Important: Make sure that anyone to whom you give your customer password is also explicitly authorized to do so.
* ID data of the new customer (ID copy must be provided)
Please note that any discounts or individual benefits (e.g. Connect Plus) can neither be transferred nor reordered.
Current active subscriptions, which in addition also authorize the respective hardware (2. BviaMyNex), are only available as a never-ending course of action. This also applies to Mobplionist (also known as Mnius-Mobplionist), unless otherwise agreed
A1 Billing
